actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for services furnished by physicians' assistants, and to amend title II of such act to provide that a beneficiary's entitlement to old-age, survivors, or disability insurance benefits shall continue through the month of his or her death.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides payment under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act for services furnished by physicians' assistants. States that a beneficiary's entitlement to old-age, survivors, or disability insurance benefits under title II of the Social Security Act shall continue through the month of his or her death.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for services furnished by physicians' assistants, and to amend title II of such act to provide that a beneficiary's entitlement to old-age, survivors, or disability insurance benefits shall continue through the month of his or her death.
